dialogbox.wateringCanQuestion: How should I use my watering wan?
dialogbox.hoeQuestion: How should I use my hoe?
configMenu.wateringCan.title: Better Watering Can
configMenu.hoe.title: Better Hoe
configMenu.enabled.name: Enabled
configMenu.enabled.tooltip: Enable or disable the mod function.
configMenu.selectionOpenKey.name: Open selection menu
configMenu.selectionOpenKey.tooltip: Bind key for open selection menu.
configMenu.alwaysHighestOption.name: Always highest option
configMenu.alwaysHighestOption.tooltip: If this setting is checked then it will automatically select highest options for your tool. (You cannot open selection menu if this option activated only)
configMenu.selectTemporary.name: Select only temporary
configMenu.selectTemporary.tooltip: If this setting is checked then you can open the selection menu but your selected option only will remain for ~60 second before the highest option will be restored.
